title: Can Tahm Kench swallow allied Eggnivia?
body:
The topic says it all!
Can Tahm Kench swallow allied Eggnivia?

Was that already answered in a faq?

replies.body: Tahm can indeed devour Anivia while she's in egg form. Her passive timer continues while she's devoured, so she'll usually be back as a phoenix by the time she pops out.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9GArhWHy,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-06-28T07:41:37.392+0000)
>
> Tahm can indeed devour Anivia while she's in egg form. Her passive timer continues while she's devoured, so she'll usually be back as a phoenix by the time she pops out.

what about zac's blob??

Lime flavoured for default skin
Blackcurrant for Secret weapon
Blue Raspberry for Pool party
Zac blobs are treated as minions, and that might not be very helpful...

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9GArhWHy,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-06-28T07:41:37.392+0000)
>
> phoenix

ಠ_ಠ
Thank you Meddler! Just what I was wanting to know!

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9GArhWHy,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-06-28T07:41:37.392+0000)
>
> Tahm can indeed devour Anivia while she's in egg form. Her passive timer continues while she's devoured, so she'll usually be back as a phoenix by the time she pops out.

On a slightly related topic. How does it interact with Champion clones, such as Leblanc's Mirror image or Shaco's Hallucinate?
Though I haven't tested it, I would assume it is treated as a champion for ability interactions.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9GArhWHy,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-06-28T07:41:37.392+0000)
>
> Tahm can indeed devour Anivia while she's in egg form. Her passive timer continues while she's devoured, so she'll usually be back as a phoenix by the time she pops out.

Cryophoenix
Am I the only one imagining Tahm just eating a random egg in the jungle, waddling back to lane and suddenly {{champion:34}} bursting out of his mouth?
Considering how slow anivia is, I wouldn't be surprised if a Jungle Tahm did this after giving her blue buff.
only the best service here at chez kench.
omg the plays :D
Probably, yes. I don't think he can devour a Zac blob though :/
zac blobs are minion likes i dont see any reason why he shouldnt be
Visions of Aliens

I am going on PBE soon to test out sated devourer to see how it works before people try something stupid. I'll probably try tahm, if I have an anivia on my team at some point I'll try it out, if I can.
Awaiting your response.
Apparently meddler responded, so you should take a look at that.
I think they said the only things he can't eat are epic monsters and buffs so... yeah, probably.
she's counted as a champion for things like smite, soraka e, morde ult, etc. so i'd assume he can.
Well she can be ccd, so mostly likely yes.

Faq isint out yet

but HOLY SHIT THAT WOULD BE AMAZING

he could completely save her life.
Hrs on the pbe though
